Employment: Mom states that she and dad were both at work.
Safety: CPS Involvement YES CPS involvment comment: Mom denies a history of CYS involvement. LSW informed mom a child line report will be filed tonight.

Mom reports that she after received a call from her father telling her to return to the home as fast as possible that patient shot himself. Mom reports that patient shot himself with a pellet gun and that her father owns real guns but they are kept locked up. LSW called Franconia Township police and spoke with Corporal Ed Hall who reports that when officers arrived at the home the patient was alert and stated he was trying to kill himself. Corporal Hall reports that patient used a .22 caliber revolver with one round in it to shoot himself and that a large vault with firearms was found in the basement unlocked.
